verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تُقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيِ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu la tuqaddimu bayna yadayi allahi wa rasulihi wa ittaqu allaha inna allaha sami'un 'alim
verses.translation: O you who have believed, do not put [yourselves] before Allah and His Messenger but fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَرْفَعُوا أَصْوَاتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ النَّبِيِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا لَهُ بِالْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَن تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالُكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu la tarfa'u aswatakum fawqa sawti an-nabiyyi wa la tajharu lahu bi-al-qawli ka-jahri ba'dikum li-ba'din an tahbata a'malukum wa antum la tash'urun
verses.translation: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَاتَهُمْ عِندَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ امْتَحَنَ اللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُمْ مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Inna alladhina yaghudduna aswatahum 'inda rasuli allahi ula'ika alladhina imtahana allahu qulubahum li-at-taqwa lahum maghfiratun wa ajrun 'azim
verses.translation: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of Allah - they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَاءِ الْحُجُرَاتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Inna alladhina yunadunaka min wara'i al-hujurati aktharuhum la ya'qilun
verses.translation: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muhammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa law annahum sabaru hatta takhruja ilayhim lakana khayran lahum wa allahu ghafurun rahim
verses.translation: And if they had been patient until you [could] come out to them, it would have been better for them. But Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن جَاءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوا أَن تُصِيبُوا قَوْمًا بِجَهَالَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَادِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu in ja'akum fasiqun bi-naba'in fa-tabayyanu an tusibu qawman bi-jahalatin fa-tusbihu 'ala ma fa'altum nadimin
verses.translation: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful

verses.arabic: وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِي كَثِيرٍ مِّنَ الْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَزَيَّنَهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْكُفْرَ وَالْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الرَّاشِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Wa a'lamu anna fikum rasula allahi law yuti'ukum fi kathirin min al-amri la'anittum wa lakinna allaha habbaba ilaykumu al-imana wa zayyanahu fi qulubikum wa karraha ilaykumu al-kufra wa al-fusuqa wa al-'isyan ula'ika humu ar-rashidun
verses.translation: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah. If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the [rightly] guided

verses.arabic: فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Fadlan mina allahi wa ni'matan wa allahu 'alimun hakim
verses.translation: [It is] as bounty from Allah and favor. And Allah is Knowing and Wise

verses.arabic: وَإِن طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِن بَغَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا عَلَى الْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَاتِلُوا الَّتِي تَبْغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيءَ إِلَىٰ أَمْرِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَاءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا بِالْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa in ta'ifatani mina al-mu'minina iqtatalu fa-aslihu baynahuma fa-in baghat ihdahuma 'ala al-ukhra fa-qatilu allati tabghi hatta tafi'a ila amri allahi fa-in fa'at fa-aslihu baynahuma bi-al-'adli wa aqsitu inna allaha yuhibbu al-muqsitin
verses.translation: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of Allah. And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Innama al-mu'minuna ikhwatun fa-aslihu bayna akhawaykum wa ittaqu allaha la'allakum turhamun
verses.translation: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allah that you may receive mercy

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُونُوا خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَاءٌ مِّن نِّسَاءٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوا أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا بِالْأَلْقَابِ ۖ بِئْسَ الِاسْمُ الْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ الْإِيمَانِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu la yaskhar qawmun min qawmin 'asa an yakunu khayran minhum wa la nisa'un min nisa'in 'asa an yakunna khayran minhunna wa la talmizu anfusakum wa la tanabazu bi-al-alqabi bi'sa al-ismu al-fusuqu ba'da al-imani wa man lam yatub fa-ula'ika humu az-zalimun
verses.translation: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule [other] women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by [offensive] nicknames. Wretched is the name of disobedience after [one's] faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اجْتَنِبُوا كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ الظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu ijtani bu kathiran mina az-zanni inna ba'da az-zanni ithmun wa la tajassasu wa la yaghtab ba'dukum ba'dan ayuhibbu ahadukum an ya'kula lahama akhihi maytan fa-karihtumuhu wa ittaqu allaha inna allaha tawwabun rahim
verses.translation: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَاكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَائِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوا ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha an-nasu inna khalaqnakum min dhakarin wa untha wa ja'alnakum shu'uban wa qaba'ila li-ta'arafu inna akramakum 'inda allahi atqakum inna allaha 'alimun khabir
verses.translation: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted

verses.arabic: قَالَتِ الْأَعْرَابُ آمَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَلَٰكِن قُولُوا أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ الْإِيمَانُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَالِكُمْ شَيْئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qalati al-a'rabu amanna qul lam tu'minu wa lakin qulu aslamna wa lamma yadkhuli al-imanu fi qulubikum wa in tuti'u allaha wa rasulahu la yalitkum min a'malikum shay'an inna allaha ghafurun rahim
verses.translation: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful"

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا وَجَاهَدُوا بِأَمْوَالِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الصَّادِقُونَ
verses.transliteration: Innama al-mu'minuna alladhina amanu billahi wa rasulihi thumma lam yartabu wa jahadu bi-amwalihim wa anfusihim fi sabili allahi ula'ika humu as-sadiqun
verses.translation: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ اللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Qul a-tu'allimuna allaha bi-dinikum wa allahu ya'lamu ma fi as-samawati wa ma fi al-ardi wa allahu bi-kulli shay'in 'alim
verses.translation: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things"

verses.arabic: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَن أَسْلَمُوا ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا عَلَيَّ إِسْلَامَكُم ۖ بَلِ اللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَن هَدَاكُمْ لِلْإِيمَانِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Yamunnuna 'alayka an aslamu qul la tamunnu 'alayya islamakum bali allahu yamunnu 'alaykum an hadakum li-al-imani in kuntum sadiqin
verses.translation: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful"

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Inna allaha ya'lamu ghayba as-samawati wa al-ardi wa allahu basirun bima ta'malun
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do
